text: The only things that should be doing Mac and Windows testing are packages with platform-specific code like binaries. Everyone else is just wasting time.

elements.text: The only things that should be doing Mac and Windows testing are packages with platform-specific code like binaries. Everyone else is just wasting time.

text: Oh... No one ever told me that! I thought testing on different OSes was a _good_ thing to do! What if something is platform specific down the dependency tree? Is there an easy way to know that?

elements.text: Oh... No one ever told me that! I thought testing on different OSes was a
thing to do! What if something is platform specific down the dependency tree? Is there an easy way to know that?

text: Install and see what binaries you get
